subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: Darren Chiacchia, a 2004 United States Olympic equestrian team member, was injured during an event in Tallahassee, Fla. Chiacchia, 42, was injured during a fall at the Red Hills Horse Trials competition, the event organizers at Red Horse Trails said, and was airlifted to a hospital. The extent of his injuries was unknown. The horse he was riding, Baron Verdi, was not hurt.
